name: Bonemerang
viability: The debate you might have with yourself is: Bonemerang or Earthquake? In reality, both are fine choIces to be running on Cubone or Marowak. While Earthquake is 100% accurate, Bonemerang has the ability to not only break Substitutes, but to hit past them. Earthquake only hits once, so that might be a problem when the opponent is under a substitute. In Doubles and Triples, Earthquake is a better choIce since it hits all adjacent Pok√©mon, whereas Bonemerang doesnt.
